name: 9.8 m/s^2 Homosapien
description:
9.8 m/s^2 Homosapien is a gravity switching game where the only control is switching gravity. There will be ice spikes, grinding gears, exploding bombs, and crushing weights that will all be in your way and try to kill you. Avoid these obstacles and reach the portal by harnessing the force of gravity. 

Instructions:  Space bar - switch gravity
